ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Allowed hosts to addres DNS rebinding vulnerability

AUTH_CHANGE_EMAIL_TTL_IN_MINUTES.description: Expiry time for a change email request, default is 1440 minutes(1 day)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key for S3 storage.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Key for S3 storage.

BOOTCAMP_DB_CONN_MAX_AGE.description: The maximum age of database connections

BOOTCAMP_DB_DISABLE_SSL.description: Disables SSL to postgres if set to True

BOOTCAMP_ECOMMERCE_BASE_URL.description: The base url of this application to be used in emails

BOOTCAMP_ECOMMERCE_EMAIL.description: Email to send ecommerce alerts to

BOOTCAMP_ECOMMERCE_SAML_BASE_URL.description: (Optional) If provided, this base URL will be used instead of BOOTCAMP_ECOMMERCE_BASE_URL for SAML login/logout URLs

BOOTCAMP_ENVIRONMENT.description: The execution environment that the app is in (e.g. dev, staging, prod)

BOOTCAMP_LOG_LEVEL.description: The logging level for the application

BOOTCAMP_REPLY_TO_ADDRESS.description: E-mail to use for reply-to address of emails

BOOTCAMP_SUPPORT_EMAIL.description: Email address listed for customer support

BOOTCAMP_USE_S3.description: Use S3 for storage backend (required on Heroku)

CELERY_BROKER_URL.description: Where celery should get tasks, default is Redis URL

CELERY_RESULT_BACKEND.description: Where celery should put task results, default is Redis URL

CLOUDFRONT_DIST.description: The cloudfront distribution for the app

CYBERSOURCE_EXPORT_SERVICE_ADDRESS_OPERA.description: Whether just the name or the name and address should be used in exports verification. Refer to Cybersource docs.

CYBERSOURCE_EXPORT_SERVICE_ADDRESS_WEIGH.description: The weight of the address in determining whether a user passes exports checks. Refer to Cybersource docs.

CYBERSOURCE_EXPORT_SERVICE_NAME_WEIGHT.description: The weight of the name in determining whether a user passes exports checks. Refer to Cybersource docs.

CYBERSOURCE_EXPORT_SERVICE_SANCTIONS_LIS.description: Additional sanctions lists to validate for exports. Refer to Cybersource docs.

CYBERSOURCE_INQUIRY_LOG_NACL_ENCRYPTION_.description: The public key to encrypt export results with for our own security purposes. Should be a base64 encoded NaCl public key.

CYBERSOURCE_REFERENCE_PREFIX.description: a string prefix to identify the application in CyberSource transactions

CYBERSOURCE_WSDL_URL.description: The URL to the cybersource WSDL

EDXORG_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the edX instance to use for logging in.

EDXORG_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID configured in the edX instance

EDXORG_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret configured in the edX instance

HUBSPOT_CREATE_USER_FORM_ID.description: Form ID for Hubspot Forms API

HUBSPOT_FOOTER_FORM_GUID.description: Form guid over hub spot for footer block.

HUBSPOT_MAX_CONCURRENT_TASKS.description: Max number of concurrent Hubspot tasks to run

HUBSPOT_NEW_COURSES_FORM_GUID.description: Form guid over hub spot for new courses email subscription form.

HUBSPOT_TASK_DELAY.description: Number of milliseconds to wait between consecutive Hubspot calls

JOBMA_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The JOBMA access token used to access their REST API

JOBMA_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for accessing Jobma

JOBMA_LINK_EXPIRATION_DAYS.description: The number of days for Jobma links to expire

JOBMA_WEBHOOK_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The Jobma access token used by us to verify that a postback came from Jobma

MAILGUN_BATCH_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Maximum number of emails to send in a batch

MAILGUN_BCC_TO_EMAIL.description: Email which gets BCC'd on outgoing email

MAILGUN_KEY.description: The token for authenticating against the Mailgun API

MAILGUN_SENDER_DOMAIN.description: The domain to send mailgun email through

MAX_FILE_UPLOAD_MB.description: The maximum size in megabytes for an uploaded file

MIDDLEWARE_FEATURE_FLAG_COOKIE_MAX_AGE_S.description: Maximum age for feature flag cookies

MITOL_HUBSPOT_API_RETRIES.description: # times to retry a failed Hubspot API request

NOVOED_API_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the NovoEd API

NOVOED_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the NovoEd

NOVOED_SAML_CERT.description:
Contents of the SAML certificate for NovoEd ('
' line separators)

NOVOED_SAML_CONFIG_TTL_HOURS.description: The number of hours that the SAML config is expected to be accurate

NOVOED_SAML_DEBUG.description: Flag indicating whether the SAML config should be set to debug mode

NOVOED_SAML_KEY.description:
Contents of the SAML key for NovoEd ('
' line separators)

SAML_IDP_FALLBACK_EXPIRATION_DAYS.description: The number of days to extend the SP metadata if validUntil does not exist or is in the past

SESSION_ENGINE_BACKEND.description: The backend that will support user sessions. This should be a module within django.contrib.sessions.backends. Possible values: signed_cookies, db, cached_db, cache, file. (https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.1/topics/http/sessions/#configuring-the-session-engine)

SITE_NAME.description: The site name for the app

USE_X_FORWARDED_HOST.description: Set HOST header to original domain accessed by user
